resources.string: The installation is almost done! So you want to know more about XOSP? Well XOSP basically which stands for the Xperia Open Source Project is project based on CM and the main idea is to create a custom minimal Xperia based ROM, by including the essential things which a user would use from a ROM.If you came here without XOSPApps reboot in recovery and do right now cause this is not the complete ROM without them :) %s.

The installation is almost done! So you want to know more about XOSP? Well XOSP basically which stands for the Xperia Open Source Project is project based on CM and the main idea is to create a custom minimal Xperia based ROM, by including the essential things which a user would use from a ROM.If you came here without XOSPApps reboot in recovery and do right now cause this is not the complete ROM without them :) %s.
